storyInfo: Pinus Sylvestris splits up to try and find leads into the Great Kawalerielki Separation, but Wild Mane Iwona suffers a surprise Armorless Union attack. Nightmare Knight drifts through the city, and the Candle Knight once again parts with the spokesman in acrimony.

attributes.content: Topple the Chamber! Topple the nobles! Death to Olmer Ingra!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Topple the Chamber! Topple the nobles! Death to Olmer Ingra!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Wrath is spreading between us.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: I get it, but...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Wrath. We're all used to that state of mind.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But it makes a person short-sighted. We've already suffered for it.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Hah. Keeping a clear head sure ain't my style.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You don't need to keep it, just charge ahead with it, that's all.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I can roll with that. Sure, I'll leave the complicated stuff to you guys, and the fights, you leave to me.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I've been holding this in forever, Sona.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Before Szewczyk and Ashley come back, we need to find people who were there... reporters work, heck, eyewitnesses work. The more, the better.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: ...The Great Kawalerielki Separation.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: External reports said it was an industrial accident caused by damage from Leithanian extremists, to shatter the smooth running of the Major.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: No city comes that weak. More than likely it was everyone dragging each other down.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But what's clear is the whole shake-up showed people just where Kawalerielki... this 'City of Greatness' was rotting through.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Never mind me, you're sort of a famous knight too, aren't you? Won't strutting around like this get you recognized?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Who'd care about a nobody like me while the Major's on?
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Why are you the one going with me? I thought it'd be that sniper. She's a better fit with this sort of thing.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Justyna? She's more liable to get exposed than I am, actually, not to mention she's already the one who dared to rescue you.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: No need to keep dangerous elements together, and you're both bow knights. If you did get attacked in the streets, it'd be tough to handle.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Isn't that nice. No, you just wanted to keep an eye on me, didn't you?
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: A knight-noble wouldn't make peace with the Infected, even if he clashed with the Armorless. Do you really think I'd let my guard down around you?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Rubbish. I worry I'll get infected, and I worry my family will. What's wrong with that?
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Don't think you're my lone disbeliever, Ashlock Knight.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Really? Then now seems like your best chance to escape, Plastic Knight.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: So long as—
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: —You shut up, you petulant brat.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: I didn't come to play rise of the weak with you. I don't give a damn about your demands, or whether you need your trust in each other to live—
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: —I only came to hunt those audacious bastards down. I guarantee the Armorless will give me hell, and they'll put my family through worse doing it, so I'm making the first damned move.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: That's why I'm here now. My wife, my child, and no one else. Believe me, I don't have the slightest concern for your ridiculous cause.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Don't get so full of yourself, Infected. You think the only thing that makes up this city is 'your enemies' and 'your friends?' What a model victim complex...
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Let me tell you, in Kazimierz, in this society of ours, the majority are 'not concerned with you at all.'
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: It's quiet around here.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: This is the General Chamber's ground floor. Only nomadic city engineers and maintenance crew are allowed into the structuring below us. We'll have to stop here.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Relax, no need to be so cautious. No cameras here.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: But can you guarantee there's no Armorless?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Hilarious. The Armorless wouldn't choose a public venue—especially not a hub of the elite like this to start killing.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: It'd give the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi too much of a hold on them. That's where they draw the line, and we're going to toe that line for all it's worth.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Realistically, how many knights does Kazimierz have? They've got nothing but ID-type fodder to judge who's who... it's child's play to disguise.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: So what is your family going to do?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Aside from my missing wife and child, they've been sent out of Kawalerielki already.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: The Armorless Union has its informants far beyond where Kawalerielki ends.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: I know that.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Maybe if I get another chance, I'll cut back on the recklessness. At least until my child grows up, and can take care of himself.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: But the K.G.C.C. don't sell remedies for regret. This is where we are, Infected, so we'd better put the complaining to rest.
attributes.name: Plastic Knight

attributes.content: Huff... dammit, the supermarkets and restaurants are all shut. Why did they set a meeting for this time.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: *Sigh*... If I revise the draft early morning, maybe they won't chew me out so hard in editing—
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: —Huh?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Sorry to bother you. You must be pretty beat after a long day of work, huh, Mister Reporter?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: A... A knight? Where did you come from?!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Easy now, sir.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Want a sandwich?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: H—Huh?!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: C'mon. I'm asking because you look like someone dragged you through a car wash.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Please leave immediately, or I'll sound the alarm! Even if you're a knight, this is...
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Eep?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Your phone lines are cut.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Here's the deal. Both your neighbors are out far away, and right now, my partners in crime are pretending to be renovation workers, carrying out rush repairs on this building's elevator and entrance.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Wh... What the hell are you trying to do? I don't have any money, I don't know anything...
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Easy, there, wind it down. You make me out like I'm a robber here.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You. There was a report on the 'Great Kawalerielki Separation' a few years back. You wrote that, right?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: M... Me?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: With an incident that huge, every outlet in the whole country would be reporting on it. There's no way I didn't write something...
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: B—But, I'm just a net editor... I was still working at The Illuminator then, and by now that whole paper's been bought out.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Mm-hm, I know, which is why you only need to answer a couple questions for us, and then we're gone. Sound good?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We just want to get an idea of the situation. And we got you supper on the side.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: (Err... is she actually carrying a bag of sandwiches?)
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: You had an interview in your report with a pretty unassuming janitor, who said 'I thought there was an earthquake, and I climbed out of the transport pipes, I was so desperate.'
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Looking at the picture, this is the General Chamber of Commerce Tower, right? During the Great Separation, the electricals were all out, but the Chamber has a standalone power source.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Can you give me some details about what you... saw of things?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Reporting in, 'Lazurite' Monique.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: We have traces of movement from a few targets here. They've split up to investigate something. And the Kuranta 'Wild Mane' Iwona Krukowska is nearby guarding the Infected.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: They've set up an Infected community.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: But they're still hoping their own strength, their own violence will protect it from falling apart?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Is this how stupid knights have gotten these days?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Right. Here's their list of contacts... and some calls we've intercepted from them.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: They're very cunning, steering clear of wireless communication. There's a good chance these messages are all a smokescreen.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Forget anything else, they're investigating the 'Great Kawalerielki Separation.'
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Er... how do you...
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: If your deductions are as convoluted next time, either you're dead, or you're out of a job. Learn a thing or two.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: R—Right! Please give your instructions!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: (Exasperated sigh) With Wild Mane Knight left alone, what instructions could you even need?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: S—Sorry, I'll go give the order to surround—
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: If anything happens with the media or Adeptus Sprawiedliwi, will your heads on the chopping block even make up for it?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: I... I can't...
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Forget it. I'll go myself.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Y—You don't need to go to the trouble!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: It's not right to pull off that big of a maneuver before any official orders come from up top.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Taking out an Infected knight's nothing difficult, but it has to be silent, no hide nor hair. Can any of you do that?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: If you get it, then zip it, and while it's zipped, drag Roy back for me. They could've picked anyone to keep watch on the Nightzmora. Why waste a Lazurite's time on the clock?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Seriously...
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Target, confirmed. Wild Mane Knight, Iwona Krukowska.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Date, weather, present state of mind... but this isn't an official assignment. I shouldn't need to record so much detail.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Hmm. And no need to kill too many Infected. It'll be terrible on the million-to-one I get infected myself.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Anyway...
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Huh, wonder what that sweet smell's about.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Flowers? Who's planting flowers here?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: (Relaxed beeping noises)
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight

attributes.content: Whaaat?! Who knew you could do this stuff too, Justice!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: (Hurried beeping noises)
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight

attributes.content: Swoosh.
Loosing a rubber arrow, Justice Knight knocks over the plastic water bottle beside it, fresh water hydrating the flowerpot in front of them.
(Loud beeping noises)
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight

attributes.content: Justice! You're amazing! Did you learn to do this yourself?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: (Loud beeping noises)
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight

attributes.content: —What?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Whoa, watch out! The wall's come down!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: (Hurried beeping noises)
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight

attributes.content: No questions! Move!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: (Hurried beeping noises)
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight

attributes.content: Tch—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: (Couldn't confirm my position, so she immediately began vacating. Solid intuition.)
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: (But... this is too slow of a pace.)
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: I'll be seeing you.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: So we just come back like this? And, uh, the Union shouldn't be randomly waltzing into the General Chamber's building, should it?
attributes.name: A Gofer Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: *Sigh* Of course we can't, logically.
attributes.name: A Seasoned Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: But you can't ignore a Lazurite's orders... ugh, I didn't have a boss this annoying back when I was a merc.
attributes.name: A Seasoned Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Won't it be a little... unsafe, leaving Monique alone in the Infected ghetto?
attributes.name: A Gofer Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Ha, you're worrying about her? What, us? Worried about a Lazurite?
attributes.name: A Seasoned Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Well... the Lazurites are people too, and she looks pretty young...
attributes.name: A Gofer Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: *Sigh*... You've never seen the Lazurites get serious first-hand? You'll wanna make sure to prepare yourself, then.
attributes.name: A Seasoned Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Have you heard how it goes? 'Platinum' needs to be someone with the leadership to guide a team, the brains to plan out the big picture in the most involved operations.
attributes.name: A Seasoned Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: As for the 'Lazurites'... they say the ones of the past, whether one or two... were all chosen because they could 'kill any one target in Kazimierz.'
attributes.name: A Seasoned Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Uh... you're kidding, right? Any? Including all those campaign knights?
attributes.name: A Gofer Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Well, that's lost to history... I'm not sure if it's true or not. They say even a few campaign knight leaders were—
attributes.name: A Seasoned Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Oh, hey, what's got you two so excited?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Erk...
attributes.name: A Gofer Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: R-Roy, sir!
attributes.name: A Seasoned Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: You know something? People will suspect the Armorless Union, showing up publicly at the K.G.C.C.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: It might be comedy to you, but you guys should take a guess. There's a reason they don't let the Union wander in and out of here... why?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: (Shudder) I—It... it's not like that...
attributes.name: A Gofer Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Sir, this is a misunderstanding. Monique wanted us here to notify you. Otherwise, we would never—
attributes.name: A Seasoned Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Ahahaha, why so tense? What, you scared I'm gonna eat you?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: As... long as you understand. Monique's carrying something out in the Infected ghettos, and she wanted us to inform you.
attributes.name: A Seasoned Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Infected, huh.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Alright, got it. Thanks for the notice.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Now get out of here quick, it smells of sterilizer everywhere. Hm, but the coffee downstairs is pretty good. You can steal a cup before you go.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: See you. Hope you have fun with work~
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Phew.
attributes.name: A Seasoned Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: ...Ulk... *cough* *cough*... urp...
attributes.name: A Gofer Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Where's the bathroom... *sigh* I told you to prepare yourself.
attributes.name: A Seasoned Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: I'm lucky enough I was a merc, but most others who switch jobs to join us are in for a little roughness. Just ride it out.
attributes.name: A Seasoned Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Urgh... hah, hah... am I still alive?
attributes.name: A Gofer Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: You are, you are. Now you get it, don't you? We shouldn't get mixed up with their work.
attributes.name: A Seasoned Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: And Monique wouldn't mess up.
attributes.name: A Seasoned Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: (Another wide shot? What's the deal?)
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: (But this force—I still can't clock the position—is the enemy messing with me?!)
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Dammit—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Is this all I can do?! Run?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Missed... grr.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Hey, miss, don't give me that look. I just wanted to ask you about something.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Am I disturbing you? If you're not up to answer, I'll go on my way.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Ah, thank you. Actually, I'm looking for someone—
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: —'Lazurite' Monique. It's a pseudonym, of course. Heard of her, if you don't mind me asking?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: As it happens, I'm looking for someone too.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Oh? Sorry to confess, I'm fresh on the boat here. Can't say I recognize all that many heads or tails yet.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: That's alright, he's a plenty infamous bounty hunter. Seeing him once would be enough to remember.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Hoo. Go on, do tell?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: The 'Guildmaster', Toland Cash.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Thirteen counts of murder, eight of robbery, twenty-three of disturbing the peace, six of illegal Originium dealing... and to top it off—conspiracy, on one count.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Also, most importantly, he's gotten in the way of my work... twice, now.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: I hate people who get in the way of my work. Despise them.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Well, well... Say, ever think you've gotten the wrong idea about him?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: All of us turn a blind eye to the bounty hunters' influence by default... but they shouldn't have organized, let alone grown large-scale.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: That's not fair to say. With 'Flamelung' and 'Yellow Smog' suddenly AWOL—poor brothers—that big of a territory without any boss, of course there's gotta be an organization. Work needs it to go smooth.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Go ahead. Calls always come at the worst times, don't they?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: It's me. I'm working.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: ...Got it.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: It seems you're leaving. What an awful shame.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Tell Miss Monique I said hi.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Likewise, then. Tell Toland this for me.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Tell him—
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: —That slippery little clown face of yours spoils my appetite.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: We really had a close shave there, Kuranta.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: She might not catch up to me, but I'm sure she'd win the fight.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Who... the hell are you?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I'll introduce myself again. Toland Cash, just a bounty hunter.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I come in good faith—that's my real name, you know. My old daddy gave it to me before he drank himself to the other side. True story.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Bounty guy, just now, that was the Armorless Union's...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: The Armorless Union's Lazurite. Put away any funny ideas of chasing her—you'd all be done for then.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: But if even the Lazurite's showing up to this party, that means I'm in the right place.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: You're mad off the mark if you want treasure. Only the Infected, homeless and penniless living out the days here.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: What are you here looking for? Huh, bounty hunter?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: The will to rebel.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I came on this informant's info, see... heard you guys were planning something real extraordinary.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I don't want you to jump the gun, now. There's no traitors in your gang, and I can tell you they didn't have the loose lips to blab to me.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: But when the city moves forward, it sucks everyone into the wake. You can't just make believe it's only 'heroes' and 'villains' in the Grand Knight Territory, right?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I'm not Sona. I'm not all good at chewing this stuff over.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: But seeing how you just saved my life, I guess I can show you to someone or other.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Now THAT'S what I call lifesaving.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: (Slow beeping noises)
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight

attributes.content: Oh? What's this? A takeout cart?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Takeout, my ass! This is my pet! My pride and joy! You watch what you say!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Hah, knights really have gotten interesting.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I suddenly understand why I hate seeing Toland Cash so much.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Why's that?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Because he's too much like you.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: *cough*... Are you calling me out?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Get on with it. What did you interrupt me for?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: You've been too hard at it lately. Isn't it nice, relaxing every once in a while?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I'm heading back to work.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: No, nuh-uh, you've been getting more and more workaholic lately.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: See, the curtain's pulled open on the Radiant Knight's Major adventure, and I'm not exactly resting easy with just Platinum on the case.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: And the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi has been scarily quiet this year. Usually they'd be firing opening shots against the Board of Directors by now, what with all their documents and meetings.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: And this is your grounds for shirking work?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Not entirely. The 'three above' are having us keep this in check lately.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Hmm.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: To be strict about it, the Infected are creating an opportunity for us.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Darksteel'll seize that to eliminate the last of those who know what really happened, and shift the blame to the Infected.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: What we should be doing now isn't harming the Infected. When it comes to it, in fact, we even ought to give them a little help from the shadows.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: But we can't be too obvious about this, so I let you enjoy the hassle of finding them, seeing it through to the end.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Work really does shift under your feet when it wants.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: We're on the Board of Directors's dime, after all. All we can do is be their people.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Provisionally, of course.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: How's the Nightzmora business going?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Not much to be concerned with, just a moron tracing the footsteps of old-timey legends.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: We'll fix up a match for him to face one of the Grand Knights later. After the 'Nightzmora reenactment' thing gets enough buzz, it can get dumped.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: That's 'knights' for you, after all. A Nightzmora orphan living in the present day—it's gotta be hard on the soul.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Batbayar, what are you following me for?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You can drop that tone with me like you're on your victory lap. There's youth in your voice. Odds are you're younger than me.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Are you always so... aimless?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Don't you have anywhere to go? A titled Major knight being a tramp in Kawalerielki, really?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Cities disgust me.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Walking helps clear the mind. Kurantas always walk the grasslands.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: It ain't no grassland here.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: It should be.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: And you just go on like this?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: How long has it been?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Ten years or so. Or however many. I can't even remember now.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Er... but you did get a lift to reach Kawalerielki, right?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: You crossed Kazimierz on foot?!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: R—Rubbish. You've really never 'stopped' before? Don't you even need to rest?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Batbayar, do you know of the 'Khaganquest?'
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: ...What...
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: It was once... the apotheosis of a Kuranta's glory.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: At the time a warrior comes of age, in order to manifest their glory as a Kuranta, in the company of their mother and father, they would make a promise.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: From the place they were born, they would leave for a distant site of trial. Taking only a weapon gifted by their parents, they would go on foot.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: A site of trial...?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: The site of trial is decided by themselves. True courage must be recognized by themselves.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: The way of the courageous spans a thousand folds of the earth, while the cowardly only dared choose the forests before their own door.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: A distance or lack of it was by no means the sole judge. Some brave brought back the heads of prey; some brave cut off their enemies' ears; some brave were empty-handed, but bountiful with pure gold and spices.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Our forebears never once forgot this tradition. This was proof of valor. Countless Nightzmora soldiers walked the Khaganquest, as the start of their long journey.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: So, right now, you're... you're completing your rite of adulthood alone?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Where's your parents?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Since I can recall, I had no one at all.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Batbayar, I'm not ashamed to admit. To be with you, one of the same blood, no matter how distant, consoles me somewhat.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: At least, it lets me take in that, in this age twistedly proceeding, my past brethren... are still alive.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Alright... Are you gonna hang around the Grand Knight Territory like this for the time being, then?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Kawalerielki... I learned from the travelers, this place is the center of the land of the knights, Kazimierz's glory.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Yet now I see, it's no more than a rotting fort, trampling the glory, the honor that should shine esteemed.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Once, my brethren were trialed in their Khaganquests by beast and Catastrophe. And what I face now, is a forward-roaring, grassland-crushing metal titan.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.text: Dwelling on their image amounts to nothing. Attempting to debate the attitude of the knight of now comes off as utterly foolish.
Only through one victory after another can it be understood, just how Kazimierz postures itself in the modern day.

attributes.content: It happens to block my Khaganquest.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: So I will conquer it, in order to prove my fatedness.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Each knight in Kawalerielki has their own reason to fight.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Maybe many of the ignorant beyond Kazimierz would criticize the modern knight competitions as 'defying tradition,' 'renouncing glory.'
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: But we're not of that mind at all. The times are changing, industry and finance are expanding. Do you honestly still want the people putting stock in the traditions of killing? Rampant duels paid with blood, in modern society?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: No, the General Chamber of Commerce finds it very hard to sanction such things.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Cities springing up, engines rumbling as they turn.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: This is an age of rapid progress. Yes, wildly unlike it was over a decade ago, Mr. McKee.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Madam Droste. The General Chamber expects your certain victory.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: The Infected knight crisis is intensifying. Taken as a locus, the Radiant Knight will extol it, and the Board of Directors will lose great face over it.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: I... *sigh* I don't mean to trouble you—I'm guessing you still won't accept our proposals, will you?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: But I hope you'll realize, you won't actually need to do anything.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: McKee.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: I want to decide a victor between me and the Radiant Knight, fair and square.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: 'I won't need to do anything.' These last few years, I've always been solicited as such.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Mr. McKee, as a knight, inaction itself is one brand of action. Can you sympathize with that?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Am I not even allowed the satisfaction of a single request anymore? Mr. McKee?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: No... if you really are so determined... I'll try and talk over the Knights Association and the other spokesmen.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: But... can you tell me why? You have no preexisting relationship with the Radiant Knight, as far as we know... What makes you so insistent?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Why is the General Chamber so focused on her?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Though she's of a famous family, she is no more than a knight once banished, in the end.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Tell me, just what is the K.G.C.C. so focused on?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: This isn't something you and I should discuss right now, Madam Droste.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: But... alright. Behind this affair, it's a contest between the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi and the General Chamber.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: In fact, neither the K.G.C.C. nor the Adeptus ultimately care too much who 'takes the championship.'
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Do you understand? I've currently obliged with you... I respect your way of thinking, but your steadfastness is harming the K.G.C.C.'s outlook towards you.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I'll explain to the knightclub myself.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Our Leithanian visitors wouldn't want to see any mishaps befall you in the arena, either.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Mishaps? Losing to an Infected champion, you mean?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: I've no illusions of the way they work. The Candle Knight Viviana Droste is celebrated so because she is a Leithanian.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: A Leithanian, finding success in the Kazimierz knight competitions, makes them beam.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: And since the Black Knight, it's a glory they've taken for granted. I became a substitute for the Black Knight by luck, no more.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: No more than vanity.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: It might be vain of them, yes, but their support for you is authentic. The K.G.C.C. is hoping to sign a trade agreement with the nobles at this moment, and your impact cannot be ignored.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: McKee.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Two knights meet in a contest, hoping to fight a fair battle. Is this something so inherently forbidden?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: No. You're... you're right.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Kazimierz, Leithanien. The home that birthed me.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: In childhood I imagined, that the place I lived was one where romance and glory could coexist.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: I simply want to... see, with this 'special case,' this Radiant Knight. See who comes out on top.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: At least this once, I won't need to consider how to 'win beautifully.' I only need to consider how to claim victory.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Is that not abideable?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: The outcome won't change.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: The K.G.C.C. will find some way to force the Radiant Knight's loss. Losing to you was the most appropriate decision to make.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: You support them?
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: In order to prevent this situation from degrading further... in order not to give the Adeptus more excuses to revolt, yes, I support this decision.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: McKee.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I'm somewhat disappointed in you.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: My deepest apologies, Madam.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: But... I believe it is the best option...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: My deepest apologies.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: There's a celebration feast tonight. I'll need to be on my way soon.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Right... May you travel safely.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: McKee.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: I merely, simply want to be witness in this age to a knight's radiance. True radiance.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: She's just as if a verse.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Nothing more than that.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: Farewell.
attributes.name: Candle Knight

attributes.content: A verse, was it?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Perhaps. But those poems you read... I've never once actually managed to make sense of one, Viviana.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Mr. McKee? Did you order flowers? The doorman's gotten a bouquet of marigolds, and says you ordered them.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: It was your anniversary recently, wasn't it?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Oh—uh? It was—you remembered that?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: It's my gift to you two. You've been a credit to your job. Don't forget to go home and spend time with your family.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Wow! Mr. McKee! Thank you! Thank you so, so much!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: That's fine. If you've got nothing important, go on and sign off a little early.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: You can't live without treasuring life.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee
